algorithm_technique: Find character index, slice and reverse prefix, concatenate.
problem_summary_simple: Reverse the beginning of a word up to the first occurrence of a given character.
problem_summary_technical: String manipulation: find character index, slice prefix, reverse, and re-concatenate.
key_insights: The `find()` method efficiently locates the first occurrence of the character.
String slicing and concatenation are used to construct the new string.
The problem can be solved in a single pass if implemented carefully, but the provided solution is clear and concise.
